index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Central Puget Sound Regional Transit Authority ("Sound Transit"); authorizing execution of a "Fourth Supplement to MOA for Intergovernmental Cooperation (April 20, 1998) between Central Puget Sound Regional Transit Authority (Sound Transit) and The City of Seattle for the Central Link Light Rail Project," abrogating six positions (5.5 FTE) in the Strategic Planning Office; and adding two positions in the Department of Design, Construction and Land Use; and accepting funds from Sound Transit.
